Welcome! Welcome! My self-marketing script goes like this: “T-shaped skills combined with humility to accept the boundaries of knowledge and the fallibility in running complex cloud architectures. Hence pledge to the checklist manifesto.” I prefer digital nomad SRE/DevOps opportunities.
